title: Our Community Is Ready to Welcome You Home. 2 Bedroom Apartment!
posting_body: > Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!
If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.
Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.
We have the perfect home for you!
Our two and three bedroom apartment homes feature vaulted trey ceilings in the spacious living room area.
The community offers BBQ and picnic areas, a children’s play area, a sparkling pool, and a nearby dog park.
Residents especially love their easy access to several area freeways.
Call today to schedule your tour and discover everything Knolls at West Oaks has to offer!
We are a pet friendly community!
*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.
Knolls at West Oaks participates in an affordable housing program.
Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $37,860 | 2 Occupants: $43,260 | 3
To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.
Call today to learn more about our community:
